author: Zephyrkul (Zephyrkul#1089)
install_msg:
Thank you and commiserations for installing FluffyCogs.
If you need support, find me in #support-othercogs at Red's cog support server: https://discord.gg/GET4DVk
Please feel free to ping me there since I don't monitor that channel.
name: FluffyCogs
short: Only the fluffiest of cogs go here.
description: My cogs for utility, requests, or proof-of-concepts. Or memes, as is the case with the skyrim cog.
